DOC.brief_title: iQuit Mindfully : Text Messaging Smoking Cessation
DOC.detailed_description: This study pilot investigation mindfulness-based smoking cessation treatment incorporate between-session text messaging ( `` iQuit Mindfully '' ) . Participants randomly assign one two group : Mindfulness-based Addiction Treatment ( MBAT ) iQuit Mindfully ( MBAT addition between-session text message ) . All participant receive in-person group treatment base 8-week MBAT protocol addition nicotine patch therapy self-help material . Participants assign iQuit Mindfully receive additional support via text messaging . Assessments occur baseline , weekly in-person visit , end treatment , 1-month follow-up . Feasibility , smoke abstinence , mindfulness practice , indicator tobacco dependence psychological well-being assess .
